name: imagiNation
description: UTXO Swap is an innovative decentralized exchange deployed on Nervos CKB Layer 2 infrastructure, harnessing the blockchain Extended UTXO model and robust Proof-of-Work security to enable highly efficient, intent-driven trading of Bitcoin-native assets, such as Runes and inscriptions, while offering seamless cross-chain bridging capabilities to facilitate secure, trust-minimized asset transfers between Bitcoin and CKB ecosystems, thereby enhancing scalability, interoperability, and user accessibility for decentralized finance applications.

highlights.title: Support for Diverse Asset Types
highlights.description: Enables the creation and trading of various digital assets, including meme tokens and unique collectibles, catering to diverse use cases

highlights.title: Cross-Chain Compatibility
highlights.description: Supports seamless asset transfers across UTXO-based blockchains, bridging assets like Bitcoin Ordinals and Atomicals to CKB

related.title: CKB Punks
related.desc: The first NFT collection on Nervos.

faq.a: Nervape is a multi-chain composable digital object (DOB) platform in the Nervos CKB ecosystem.

faq.q: How to get a Nervape DOB?
faq.a: You can mint or trade DOBs on the Nervape platform.
